```{r}
library(bio3d)
```

```{r}
alignment <- read.fasta("clustalo-I20241126-232353-0280-22449952-p1m.fa")
```

```{r}
# Calculate sequence identity matrix
seq_identity_matrix <- seqidentity(alignment)

```

```{r}
# Generate heatmap
heatmap(seq_identity_matrix, 
        xlab = "Sequences", 
        ylab = "Sequences", 
        col = heat.colors(256), 
        margins = c(10, 10))  # Adjust margins to ensure labels are visible

```

```{r}
library(bio3d)
pdb_hits <- blast.pdb("muscle-I20241203-053530-0192-33512747-p1m.aln-clustalw") # Replace "query.fasta" with your sequence file
print(pdb_hits)  # View the results

```
